titleStmt.title: The conversion & persecutions of Eve Cohan, now called Elizabeth Verboon a person of quality of the Jewish religion, who was baptized the 10th of October, 1680, at St. Martins in the Fields, by the Right Reverend Father in God, William, Lord Bishop of St. Asaph.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. for Richard Chiswell,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gilbert Burnet. Cf. McAlpin Coll.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
